


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.is -->
<!-- @name    isNumber -->

# ```js isNumber ```


Check if the passed value is a number

## Parameters

- **value**  Mixed: The value to check



## Example (js)

```js
import isNumber from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/number';
isNumber(12) => true
isNumber(22.3) => true
isNumber('20') => false
```
